nodes.text: My Stepfather's Face: A Soldier's Secret

My Stepfather's Face: A Soldier's Secret was a book written by Shaeeah Lawquane at the height of the New Republic. It chronicled Lawquane's childhood on Saleucami with her adopted father Cut Lawquane, a Human clone and a deserter of the Grand Army of the Republic.
The blog Star Wars: The Essential Guide to Warfare Author's Cut mistakenly identified Lawquane's homeworld as Felucia instead of Saleucami.
